DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study ass multi-component intervention increase physical activity person depression .
DOC.brief_title: Increasing Physical Activity Persons With Depression
DOC.detailed_description: The research project pilot study assess effect multi-component intervention increase physical activity among person depression . Individuals meet inclusion/exclusion criterion enrol 12-week intervention . Intervention component include self-monitoring , Active Living counseling , facility access . Blood sample collect baseline . Assessments ( anxiety , stress , sleep ) sample collection also occur 2 time point intervention ( Weeks 7 13 ) . Changes physical activity assess use Fitbits measure weekly minute moderate/vigorous activity .
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 year Positive depression screen ( Patient Health Questionnaire [ PHQ9 ] ) current antidepressant treatment Report < 150 minute weekly moderatetovigorous physical activity ( MVPA ) Exercise Vital Sign ( EVS ) Written verbal fluency English Medical condition contraindicate physical activity participation Cognitively unable give inform consent NonEnglish speaking
